column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////On the menu there's a ton to pick from - the baked goat cheese in sauce
column4: and beef with blue cheese are some of my favorites. The paella is also good
column5: granted I've only tried the seafood one - but they're a bit more of a commitment (30 min wait
column6: minimum two serving order per table). Also
column7: I tried the calamari on the most recent visit and was kind of disappointed
column8: it wasn't bad by any means but it wasn't anything special. In the seafood section - either of the scallop empanada or the garlic
